name: eXodus (itch) (Jack Le Hamster)
description:
This is my first Unity game. I used all kinds of free assets from the Unity asset store, and use the soundtrack from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IEWr5Rxs_HE. Made for Battle of the Engines gamejam (#UnityVsUE).

Flight as long as you can, control with the mouse.

Space or Mouse Click - Shoot at trees.
